CustomField.description: Calculated: if <status>!="Completed" then return <subsidy forecast> minus <EBH_AmountAlreadyPaid__c> else return <EBH_SoldItemsEligible_c> minus <EBH_AmountAlreadyPaid_c>
CustomField.formula: IF( NOT(ISPICKVAL(EBH_Status__c ,"Completed")), EBH_SubsidyForecast__c - AmountAlreadyPaid__c , EBH_Payout_SI_calc__c - AmountAlreadyPaid__c )
CustomField.label: Remaining amount to be paid
